tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_pledges_titles AS ((SELECT p.id AS pledge_id, val.category_value AS title, val.id AS title_id FROM amp_funding_pledges p JOIN amp_category_value val ON p.title = val.id WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT z.id FROM amp_funding_pledges z WHERE z.id = p.id AND z.titlefreetext IS NOT NULL AND z.titlefreetext <> '') ) UNION (SELECT p.id AS pledge_id, p.titlefreetext, -p.id FROM amp_funding_pledges p WHERE (p.titlefreetext IS NOT NULL) AND (NOT p.titlefreetext = '')) ) UNION SELECT 999999999, 'Unallocated Transations'::varchar(255), -999999999 ORDER BY pledge_id, title_id;
